## AABB.containsPoint() method

Check if the box contains specified point.

**Signature:**

```typescript
containsPoint(pt: Vector3): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pt | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The point to be checked. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the box contains the point, otherwise false.s
